oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fan Fair Reunion Show - Tape 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 2 of 3. Recording of the 1980 Fan Fair Reunion Show. Featuring Hugh Cherry (host), Grant Turner (host), Syd Heartraider (performer), Ernest Tubb (performer), Shorty and Waneta Shehead (performers) [unconfirmed], The Texas Troubadours (performers), Boxcar Willie (performer), Paul Howard (performer) Zeke Clements (performer), Jean Chapel (performer), Doc & Chickie Williams (performers).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Syd Heartraider; Ernest Tubb; The Texas Troubadours; Boxcar Willie; Paul Howard; Shorty and Waneta Shehead; Zeke Clements; Jean Chapel; Doc & Chickie Williams;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:03) Syd Heartrider thanks the crowd -- (01:07) Amazing Grace (Syd Heartrider) -- (04:54) Hugh Cherry (host) introduces Grant Turner (host) -- (05:25) Grant Turner talk about Ernest Tubb and introduces his band (The Texas Troubadours) -- (08:30) Members Chester Studdard and Ray Chemohead [Unconfirmed] greet the crowd -- (12:07) Rainbow At Midnight (Ernest Tubb and the Texas Troubadours) -- (12:59) Ernest Tubb discusses his band members with Grant Turner -- (14:27) -- Rainbow At Midnight (Ernest Tubb and the Texas Troubadours) -- (15:23) Ernest introduces more band members -- (16:12) Rainbow At Midnight (Ernest Tubb and the Texas Troubadours) -- (18:16) Ernest Tubb is played a tape of Willie Nelson to discuss their time performing together and more non-performing band members are discussed -- (22:02) Waltz Across Texas (Ernest Tubb and the Texas Troubadours) -- (24:29) -- Grant Turner lists Texas Troubadours members -- (25:56) Hugh Cherry talks with Grant Turner about upcoming performances and introduces Boxcar Willie -- (27:58) 'Orange Blossom Special' with interruption for Ernest Tubb discussion (Boxcar Willie) -- (32:45) Hugh Cherry discuss country music's meaning and introduces Paul Howard -- (35:09) All Around The Water Tank' (Paul Howard) -- (37:44) Hugh Cherry discusses Paul Howard and country music's influence -- (39:55) Shorty and Waneta Shehead [Unconfirmed] introduce themselves -- (41:05) Somebody Stepped On Board (Shorty and Waneta Shehead) [Unconfirmed] -- (43:37) Hugh Cherry introduces Zeke Clements -- (45:37) Zeke Clements introduces himself -- (46:25) Why Should I Cry?/ Smoke on the Water (Zeke Clements) -- (49:24) Hugh Cherry discusses Rockabilly and introduces Jean Chapel -- (50:46) Melody by Jean Chapel -- (52:58) Welcome to the Club (Jean Chapel) -- (54:53) Hugh Cherry recaps nearby shows and introduces Doc & Chickie Williams -- (56:45) Melody by Doc & Chickie Williams -- (59:41) Hugh Cherry begins to speak about tradition but tape ends
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Heartraider, Syd; Tubb, Ernest; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Texas Troubadours; Boxcar Willie; Howard, Paul, 1908-1984; Clements, Zeke; Chapel, Jean; Williams, Doc, 1914-2011; Williams, Chickie
